input.sentences: he was in the back preparing all the food .
the liqueur was all lined up and ready to be poured .
he was very excited the night was going to go so well .
the appetizers were so classy looking .
output.sentences: I have been preparing food for this classy event since dawn.
All the liquor was poured and ready to go.
I am so excited for my event tonight.
Once I set the appetizers out, I wanted to eat them all, they just looked so amazing!
I am really proud of myself for making such classy appetizers.
